content: snuggle up in my easy-to-crochet warm woolen scarf created with simple stitches and a soft rolling texture it s the perfect gift scarf and suitable for beginner crocheters the yarn i used for this project was given to me by @kingcoleltd #kingcolecreations #kingcole #kingcoleyarn #kingcoleambassador next week s matching hat pattern uses the rest of the 3rd ball of yarn **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until march 18 2024 > at 11 59 pm est new york time 23 59 > est for cal participants simply add > the pattern to your cart before 11 59 > pm est on march 18th and it will show > as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on march 17 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry i ve included instructions to allow you to make a project to your own custom size using any yarn and hook combo you d like you can find this extra information in my blog post ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
